description:
kuando™ Busylight Integrates with headset, desk phone or softphone.
    Easy to mount on cubicles, monitor or laptop.
    A real-time presence light displays your status so you can stay focused.
    Reduce workplace stress and interruptions to create the "better than perfect"
    workplace!
displayName: BusyLight Client for Microsoft Teams Windows
summary: A real-time presence light displays your status so you can stay focused.
author: Plenom A/S
